short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks cookie pop-up notifications on websites with the ability to add sites to a whitelist

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Block Cookie: Say Goodbye to Annoying Cookie Notifications!

Tired of constant cookie consent pop-ups disrupting your browsing experience? Block Cookie is here to help! Our powerful Chrome extension effortlessly blocks cookie notifications, allowing you to surf the web without interruptions.

Key Features:

üç™ Seamless Browsing: Enjoy a cleaner, distraction-free online experience by eliminating cookie consent banners.

üç™ User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive design makes it easy to activate and customize your settings.

üç™ Privacy Focused: Enhance your online privacy by managing cookie notifications effectively.

üç™ Whitelist Support: Need certain sites to show cookie notifications? Easily add them to your whitelist and enjoy tailored browsing experiences without compromising your preferences.

Important Note: While Block Cookie works on most websites, please be aware that some sites may use custom solutions that could prevent the extension from functioning as intended. We are continuously updating our tool to improve compatibility and user experience.
